name: Mickey Mouse Season 1
summary: Mickey Mouse is an American series of animated shorts created by Disney Television Animation. It features classic cartoon characters Mickey Mouse, Minnie Mouse, Donald Duck, Daisy Duck, Goofy Goof, and Pluto Pup in contemporary settings such as Paris and New York. The series will have the slapstick feel of classic Mickey Mouse shorts, as well as place the titular character in humorous situations that showcase his pluck and rascality, along with his long-beloved charm and good hearted-ness. It is being executive produced and directed by Emmy Award-winning artist Paul Rudish, known for his work on the Cartoon Network series Dexter's Laboratory and The Powerpuff Girls. It was announced at Disney's upfront meeting on March 12, 2013 for a premiere on June 28 on Disney Channel, with a total of 19 episodes, the first of which was made available on Disney's website as a "special preview".
info:
• 中文名: 米老鼠2013 第一季
  • 话数: 18
  • 放送开始: 2013年6月28日
  • 製作: Walt Disney Pictures
  • 动画制作: Disney Television Animation
  • 别名: 米奇欢乐多
  • 别名: 米奇欢笑多
  • 导演: Paul Rudish / Aaron Springer / Clay Morrow

eps.name: No Service
eps.desc: Mickey and Donald try to buy lunch from a beachside snack shack but are unceremoniously turned down because of the classic "No shirt, no shoes, no service" admonition (of course, Mickey dosen't wear a shirt and Donald dosen't wear shoes!)

eps.name: Yodelberg
eps.desc: Mickey longs to visit Minnie atop her mountaintop chalet but quickly realizes that the threat of avalanche has made the trek up the mountain more challenging than usual.

eps.name: Croissant de Triomphe
eps.desc: When Minnie's cafe runs out of croissants, Mickey must deliver them to her fast, fighting wild traffic and other obstacles across Paris!

eps.name: New York Weenie
eps.desc: The hot dog Mickey buys for his beloved and very hungry Minnie ends up taking him on a energetic chase through New York's Central Park.

eps.name: Tokyo Go
eps.desc: Mickey fights Tokyo's crazy commuting crowds aboard the bullet train.

eps.name: Stayin' Cool
eps.desc: On the hottest day of the year, Mickey, Donald and Goofy try to keep cool.

eps.name: Gasp!
eps.desc: After a sneaky cat breaks the bowl, Mickey attempts to save his pet fish.

eps.name: Panda-monium
eps.desc: Mickey attempts to photograph a bashful panda bear at the Beijing Zoo.
